description.p: You have resistance to cold damage while you hold this staff.
The staff has 5 charges. While holding it, you gain a charge per spell level +1 when a cold spell is casted within 60ft until 5 or more chargers are gathered
When all 5 charges are filled the next spell used by the user will be agmented roll d6 - X (X = numbers of chargers above 5)

p.em: 1: all creatures within 10 ft take (1+X)d6 cold damage
2:gain the side effects of both ray of frost and frostbite for 1 turn
4:Grant another creature within 60ft resistence to cold damage for 1+X turns
5:Gain a use of chromatic orb : cold as a bonus action for this turn only
6:Refresh 1 spell slot of level= 1+X or lower

description.p: Staff can only be used proficiency times per long rest

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard, that knows a spell that deals cold damage

p.em: Once per turn when you hit a creature with this weapon, you can choose to deal an additional 2d6 fire damage.
If you are reduced to 0 hit points while attuned to this weapon, you can choose to rise again with 50 hit points. This property can only be used once, and it recharges after 7 days.
